question.xref: DES s6, HC p114, KYTS p68
question.text: You see this line across the road at the entrance to a roundabout. What does it mean?

explanation.text: Slow down as you approach the roundabout and check for traffic from the right. If you need to stop and give way, stay behind the broken line until it is safe to emerge onto the roundabout.

answer.text: Give way to traffic from the right
Traffic from the left has right of way
